settings.text:
• Molimor is the FMCG vertical of Shree Hari Group (SHG), established over 20 years ago in Surat, Gujarat, from where our global footprint stretches across a few countries. We are a globally network chain group that has carved a niche in our field by adapting a five-tier approach towards national growth & health management.

  • Molimor is a prominent company specializing in the manufacturing and export of a wide range of FMCG (Fast-Moving Consumer Goods) products, with a strong presence in Gujarat, the heart of India’s FMCG sector. We are dedicated to providing natural food products while prioritizing the health and well-being of our customers. We understand the vital role nutrition plays in overall health; therefore, our products are carefully developed to be rich in essential nutrients and support a balanced, nourishing lifestyle.

• The company also offers toxin-free home care cleaning products under the brand name ‘Girnes’, ensuring a safer and healthier experience for households. Through Girnes, customers gain access to a wide range of household cleaning solutions designed to protect their families from toxic chemicals. Choosing our products over conventional alternatives is a conscious step toward better personal, family, and environmental health.

  • What sets Molimor apart is our strong commitment to sustainability. We recognize the importance of preserving the planet for future generations and strive to adopt responsible manufacturing practices. By choosing Molimor, you are not only prioritizing your health but also contributing to environmental conservation.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: To build a greener future by innovating and producing sustainable FMCG products that prioritize the health and well-being of every consumer.

settings.title: Our Vision
settings.text: To enrich the health of every family by delivering high-nutrition, eco-friendly products, creating a valued chain that supports a healthier world.

settings.title: Core Value
settings.text: Our business is built on enduring values: we are committed to improving the quality of life for our customers by ensuring every product meets our management's stringent, globally acceptable standards for safe consumption, and we adhere to ethical principles that foster a healthy growth environment for our nation, customers, and employees, leading to a holistic approach to healthy living.

• Molimor is more than just a company; we are a growing community that promotes health awareness and positive lifestyle transformation. Whether it is food products or household essentials, we have you covered. Our stringent quality control measures ensure that every product meets the highest standards of safety, consistency, and excellence.

  • Choose Molimor and experience the difference in quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. Together, let’s build a healthier future for ourselves and the world around us.
